text: Ojo in kofiron ʙa pesi ruj jo pusti sari xud az osmonhovu zamin namenigarand, ki aqlhoro ʙa hajrat meandozad? Agar ʙixohem, onhoro dar zamin furu meʙarem, cunone, ki ʙa Qorun kardem jo porcai azoʙero az osmon ʙar sarason meafkanem, cunone, ki ʙa qavmi Su'ajʙ kardem. Alʙatta, dar in ʙaroi har ʙandae, ki ʙa sui Alloh ʙo tavʙa ʙozmegardad, iʙratest
